prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.timeoutWarning: This prompt will automatically cancel in {timeout} seconds.

permissions.genericError: Bloxlink is missing permissions for this command. Please give me the appropriate permissions.
permissions.oneError: Please make sure I have the ``{permission}`` permission.

scans.running: This server's scan is currently running.
scans.cooldown: This server has an ongoing cooldown! You must wait **{cooldown}** more minutes.
scans.starting: A scan has now been started.

field_1.line_1: Looking for a list of a commands? Use ``{prefix}commands`` instead.
field_1.line_2: Bloxlink is a Roblox integration for Discord. We add the ability to bring over Roblox to your Discord server by syncing Group roles to Server roles, linking Roblox accounts to Discord accounts, and more. [READ MORE](https://blox.link)
field_1.line_3: We're on a mission to simplify integrating Roblox into Discord so players and groups can spend more time connecting with their friends and communities.

field_2.title: Join our community!
field_2.line_1: Join us in bringing The Roblox players together through Discord.

errors.noPermission: I was unable to view your Server Bans! Please ensure I have the ``Ban Members`` role permission.

banevaders.fileAppend: Banned account: {original_account_name} ({original_account_id}); new account(s) in server: {accounts_str}
banevaders.guildBanReason: {user} ran !banevaders and chose to ban ban-evaders
banevaders.guildKickReason: {user} ran !banevaders and chose to kick ban-evaders
banevaders.match: These members in your server have an account which is banned.
banevaders.failed: These members failed to be actioned.
banevaders.noMatch: There are no ban evaders in your server!
